extension.description:
This addon allows you to configure a Microsoft MCE remote, or any compatible remote using the eHome driver. The addon appears under the Programs heading on the Home page as "MCERemote".
The addon modifies the ReportMappingTable registry entry to configure the remote to send the standard MCE keypresses. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb189249.aspx for details.
The addon can also reset the ReportMappingTable registry entry to the default for a freshly installed MCE remote.
